Vulnerability.Title: Enable anacron Daemon
Vulnerability.Description:
The anacron daemon is used on systems that are not up 24x7. The anacron daemon will execute jobs that would have normally been run had the system not been down.
Note: This content will only provide detection of the security threat or vulnerability. Remediation must be performed manually.
